name: Mecha Super Nova
description: Mecha Super Nova is a classic tale of father and son bonding and a pastiche of Japanese and American culture. A young boy must not only prove himself to his father but to the world showcasing his piloting skills at the helm of the world’s leading edge mechanized super weapon known as “Mecha”. The lucky ones will be able to accomplish their mission by using a state of the art custom controller built by our talented team of engineers during this Jam Nation Event.  Godspeed and may you become the next MECHA SUPER NOVA CHAMPION!
